name: Game Sound Station
overview: (translated from Japanese) Here's your memorable game sound! "Game Sound Station" is a sound distribution service using streaming. You can watch sounds such as soundtrack CD, drama CD, vocal CD, etc. related to the game. You can watch 22 tracks with just the software body of "Game Sound Station", if you purchase period tickets using Wii points, you will be able to watch sounds of 1000 tracks or more freely within the time period. In addition, the content to be added is scheduled to be added from time to time. Many features such as editing playlists of your choice, setting wallpaper, effect function, and further enjoying game sound.
